name: lcd0vcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c0, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c4 ∈ LMod → c0 ∈ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c0, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c4 ∈ LMod → c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c4, clmod))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cfv(clcd, c3), c5))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c3, chlt), wcel(c5, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c4 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c2 =(LHyp ` c3)
⊣ c4 =((LCDual ` c3)` c5)
⊣ (w0 →(c3 ∈ HL ∧ c5 ∈ c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cfv(clcd, c3), c5))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c3, chlt), wcel(c5, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clh, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cfv(clcd, c3), c5))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c3, chlt), wcel(c5, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c4))

comment: Closure of the zero functional in the set of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2015.)
